title: Detonating lost bombs with Aussie army
description: The Australian Army's Explosive Ordnance Team has invited 7NEWS' Tim Lester to witness, and get involved in, detonating unexploded bombs and artillery shells which regularly wash up on Aussie shores. The Explosive Ordnance Team conducts approximately 500 disposal operations annually across Australia to avoid the risk of a civilian's accidental explosion. #australianarmy #explosiveordnanceteam #militarywaste

title: Bear squatter found underneath Californian home
description: After setting up surveillance cameras, a Southern California resident has discovered that a 500-pound bear currently lives beneath his home. According to the resident, he has previously seen this bear rummaging through his trash, and now, has footage of the bear squeezing into crawl space underneath his house. #bear #southerncalifornia #altadena
